channel.title: Nil on Tacit-Tales
channel.description: Recent content in Nil on Tacit-Tales

item.title: One Half One Fifth One Half
item.description: It has been about four weeks since the start of the period, and the semester. The classes have been alright, although I had to drop the one I was really interested in: Lambda Calculus. Not sure if I'll ever have a satisfying class on the topics of Lisp and its foundations. Protocol Validation is alright, it's got a good approach to the topics covered. Mu-calculus is up my alley, the way of expressing process is simple yet expressive.

item.title: Hello Vu
item.description: One month ago, on August 20 I landed in the Netherlands to do a Master degree at the VU Amsterdam. It's been a journey and already I can tell the experience will be well worth living. My flat is filled with 12 students, all of whom seem to be good company. If I recall, 4 are Master students the rest are Bachelors. My neighbor at +1 is a hoot. He's an Estonian studying Mathematics.
